name: Plumekith
summary: Your blood soars with the power of the magnificent garuda, proud and stoic avian warriors.
description:
Your blood soars with the power of the magnificent garuda, proud and stoic avian warriors. You only take half the normal damage from falling and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects with the air trait.Plumekith Leads To...

Garuda Magic, Garuda's SquallTraitsAasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.

Lineage: A feat with this trait indicates a character's descendance from a particular type of creature. You can have only one lineage feat. You can select a lineage feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of these feats.
